author: {'steamid': '76561199010042150', 'num_games_owned': 3874, 'num_reviews': 2454, 'playtime_forever': 65, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1681629452}
review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198275154854', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 882, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1686999276}
review:
Дуже атмосферна гра, з цікавим сюжетом і приємним візуалом. Чудовий саундтрек та ембієнт дуже вдало підкреслюють особливості кожної локації. Головоломки змушують задуматись та аналізувати усе раніше почуте чи прочитане.
Окремо хочеться відмітити епізод із фотолабораторією. Настільки приближено до реальності проявки фото + необхідність добору матеріалів, точна послідовність, важливість дотримання часу на кожному етапі. Це неймовірно. 
Однозначно рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561198152991452', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 575, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 575, 'last_played': 1680990563}
review:
Bu aralar çocukluğumda yarım bıraktığım oyunları bitiriyorum. Biri de serinin bu son oyunuydu. Yarım Bırakma sebebim tamamen o zaman ki bilgisayarımın bir noktada oyundan atmasıydı.

Oyun içindeki kitaplar ve detayları çok güzel. Alıp evinize koymak istersiniz. Oyunu bırakıp kitapları okumaya başlıyorsunuz.

Bu arada, oyun biraz zor. Türün seveni zevkle oynar.

Oyunda bir kısım var, kimyasal karışımlarla alakalı. Orada bir oflayıp poflayabilirsiniz. 

Bunların dışında hikaye olarak güzel bir point n click. Yıllar sonra bu kadar ilerleyince "Aa öyle miymiş?" etkisi yaratıyor haliyle.

Problem şu ki diğer ilk 3 oyunla beraber süre gelen bir mesele var. Oyununuzu etkilemiyor fakat büyük resimde bu konu var. Eğer te en baştan bunun peşindeyseniz size üzücü haberim var. Oyun sonunda vadedilen AGON: The Tale of the Four Dragons oyunu kelimenin tam anlamıyla yok. Yıllarca bir çıkarmaya çalışmışlar, hatta bir yerlerde demosu falan dahi varmış fakat oyun çıkarılmamış. Firma yıllar önce farklı şekillerde hikayeye devam edebiliriz mesajı verse de ortada hiçbir şey yok. Üzücü. 

Farewell Professor Hunt! Somewhere in my head, you'll still be solving secrets with all your kindness.

author: {'steamid': '76561199062931766', 'num_games_owned': 453, 'num_reviews': 195, 'playtime_forever': 269, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 269, 'last_played': 1675990012}

author: {'steamid': '76561198079495694', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 486, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 486, 'last_played': 1667070679}
review:
i dont normally review a game before finishing it, however in this case as someone who loved the prequel was hugely disappointed by this.. to much dialogue doesn't quite seem enough of a criticism, never ending strings of sentences that go on and on infinitum.  

By comparison to the last game its less indiana jones and more like a Agatha Christia novel, which is damn shame. Your suppose to be a professor of archaeology not a seasoned detective!  It feels more like a soap opera, the excess amount and length of the various documents mixed with the mass of dialogue makes you feel like the creator was making a book not a game.

All said thou, if you look past the never ending dialogue,and lengthy documents the puzzles are challenging and the character are fairly deep, and what I played did  intrigue me but not enough to want to know what happens.

Such a shame as the prior game was brilliant.

author: {'steamid': '76561199083925377', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 493, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 493, 'last_played': 1646538018}
review:
AGON - The Lost Sword of Toledo é a sequência do primeiro jogo onde há o professor Samuel Hunt, historiador do Museu Britânico que viaja para lugares remotos do mundo em busca de jogos místicos antigos estimados pelas últimas famílias que ainda podem dominá-los. Com isso o seu destino atual é a histórica cidade de Toledo, na Espanha, famosa pela tradicional fabricação de espadas. Sendo assim, ao chegar, ele encontra a filha de um velho amigo doente que precisa desesperadamente de ajuda. Ela está apaixonada por um jovem ferreiro que foi preso inocentemente pelo roubo de uma espada valiosa. O Professor logo fica sabendo de atividades maliciosas acontecendo nos bastidores tentando descobrir se é uma vingança familiar, magia negra, uma aposta perdida, uma intriga desonesta, seja la o que for ele tem que resolver o mistério porque é a única maneira de cumprir seu objetivo principal da viajem. Sendo assim, agora a sua missão é encontrar a espada e revelar a verdade.
O jogo possui uma pegada bem clássica, o jogo em si é uma aventura sendo mecanizada com uns puzzles, mas mesmo assim a história do jogo é bem desenvolvida, bem executada, consegui compreender aos poucos o que rolava por aquele local e os passados que deixava ali o mistério conosco para saber o motivo de tais coisas. Sobre o gráfico é legalzinho até, a movimentação, o controle da câmera ainda continuei achando chato, mas dá pra jogar mesmo assim e houve umas novas modalidades neste jogo havendo pequenas diferenças que para quem é detalhista vai achar legal.
Eu queria muito saber sobre o final do jogo pelo meu próprio modo de jogar, porém infelizmente por um erro de puzzle me impediu de ver o final o que infelizmente dá uma sensação do jogador jogar ali de olho em uma guia ou em outra gameplay de alguém para não cometer erros o que infelizmente estraga o prazer de quem gosta jogar por sua própria experiência ali sem nada o que atrapalhe ou ficar preso a algo que possa estragar a experiência do jogador. Então, por esse erro o meu jogo parou bem ali preste no final porque eu não podia fazer nada e nem corrigir o que me fez ir pesquisar sobre o fim do jogo...se houvesse outra solução eu teria terminado o game ali de buenas.
É aquilo sabe eu recomendaria pelo ponto da história que é boa, a trama é bem executada, porém os puzzles podem impedir de concluir o jogo o que me fez detestar neste requisito, pois poderia haver outra resolução para o fim em vez do ocorrido. Sendo assim salva o game bem antes de qualquer puzzle para conseguir finalizar de boa, eu só não fiz o load porque estava bem atrás e precisaria refazer uns puzzles chatos e como já estava sem paciência não queria gastar meu tempo nisso.

review: Czwarty epizod AGONa to w zasadzie mniej więcej więcej tego samego. Faktycznie są trochę  inaczej rozłożone akcenty (dłuższe dialogi, mniej filmików, więcej interakcji z innymi osobami i zmiany nastroju podczas gry), ale w praktyce mamy do czynienia z produktem przeznaczonym dla tych Graczy, którym odpowiadały wcześniejsze części. Czyli dla mnie. :) Szkoda tylko, że na Steamie wersja gry nie jest zlokalizowana. Grałem na polskojęzycznej wersji pudełkowej, ale z tego co wiem, jest już niedostępna. Naprawdę szkoda...

author: {'steamid': '76561198062678111', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 187, 'playtime_forever': 1163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1676929391}
review:
I'm only 2 hours into it, and I'm royally stuck.  I don't know at this point if I'll get a walkthrough & finish it.

Pros:
-Great and interesting story. It says it is based on a true story.
-graphics and color very nice
-movement is smooth.  Less jerky than other games. It's as if you simply turn your head to look down, around, etc., so there are no awkward angles. There are no zooming in/out rushes to give you nausea.  
-Likeable and interesting characters.

Cons:
- I'm already stuck with 2 puzzle boxes. I thought I was on a trail of clues for the music box, but it stalled after talking with people and reading a lot of books.  I have no where else to go or new conversations to try. Some distinctive clues would be nice, developers.  
-Will need a walk through.  
-This would not be a good first adventure game for someone new to the genre.

-----------UPDATE---------------
I restarted the game using a walkthrough every step of the way.  The puzzles for the music box, cigar box, and (!!!!!!) the dark room for photography are too hard to figure out.  And what about the kaleidoscope puzzle?  The walkthrough had 3 pages of explanation for it!!! Just -- NO.  I offer a thousand solutes to gamers who figured all of this out on their own.  

I'm planning on slugging through this game before I play the sequel.

review:
Didn't expect kind of deep story like AGON has when buying this game blind. Recommendation.
Even german soundfiles in the 4th(?) chapter - the Toledo thing...

Found a bug when bribing the police sergeant too early with the cigar - the cigar is lost and cannot be retrieved - game hangs. So save before and wait a few seconds after the dialogue and everything will be fine.
Another bug on steam linux - developing the negatives is not possible - timer does not show...
cant tell if the bug also appears under windows?!

Much tension in this game... loving it

author: {'steamid': '76561198164016063', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 333, 'playtime_forever': 504, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 239, 'last_played': 1603971520}
review:
pros

+ nice looking pre rendered graphics
+ decent voice acting
+ comic book style cut scenes
+ some hard to solve but enjoyable puzzles. there are also inventory puzzles you can combine some items
+ nice background musics
+ intriguing story and characters
+ game drops cards

cons

- first-person 360-degree view controls clunky and not comfortable 
- there are some contrived/obtuse puzzles that either you have to read too much to solve or you need to have some technical knowledge about photography and old style photograph machines. there are also frustrating maze puzzles and box arrangement puzzles towards to game's end.
- there is no steam achievements

despite some frustrating puzzles this is an decent point and click adventure game but if you don't have too much patience for this game's mostly convoluted puzzle solutions, you're should to keep a walkthrough one side. otherwise you're gonna be mad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079304872', 'num_games_owned': 103, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 457, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 457, 'last_played': 1593266793}
review:
Kolejna (niestety ostatnia, z niedokończonej serii przygód Hunt'a) gra. Czy jest godna polecenia jak poprzednia?
Cóż, wprowadzono kilka drobnych zmian, ale tutaj już nie jestem tak przychylny do polecenia jej. 
Dlaczego? Nie ma w niej animacji (są tylko 2: na początku i na końcu. Reszta to grafiki, które nie oddają tak bardzo klimatu gry jak animacje co były przedtem).
Dialogi tutaj są zdecydowanie dłuższe i dokładniejsze jak w 1 części. (szacun dla osób, które je wymyśliły, ale moim zdaniem dialogi powinny być dynamiczne, krótkie i zwięzłe, tak jak w 1 części.  Tutaj dostajemy dialogi, które są strasznie długie, nudne i "puste") . (Nie ma takiej chęci do czytania ich). Gra jest jeszcze trudniejsza od 1 części, serio szacun dla osób co wymyśliło te zagadki. Moim zdaniem sama lokalizacja nie jest zbyt ciekawa. Zdecydowanie bardziej przypadło mi bardziej Laponia niż Toledo. Ta lokalizacja jest strasznie zamknięta, nie ma takiej swobody jak w 1 części.
Podsumuwując. Agon - The Lost Sword of toledo jest również bardzo fajną, WYMAGAJĄCĄ grą, ale moim zdaniem nie jest taka ciekawa jak 1 część. Jeśli chcecie przeżyć przynajmniej część przygód Hunt'a, wybierzcie the mysterious codex, jeśli chcecie całość przygód (tak jak ja), kupujcie również tę część, ale przygotujcie się, że nie będzie taka wciągająca jak 1 część.
Moja opinia to bardziej pozytywna niż negatywna. 
Polecam dla tych co są zdeterminowani ukończyć przygody profesora z Anglii, lub mocno się nudzą.

author: {'steamid': '76561198329795660', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 167, 'playtime_forever': 160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1535696018}
review: The Lost Sword of Toledo.. episode 4 of the AGON series, is an improvement on the original game. The graphics have been slightly improved, but most importantly so has the controls. It is still the same silly panning / plotted-movement system.. though it feels more streamlined and forgiving this time around. Aside from that we have another plethora of interesting puzzles to project you through the (not-so-interesting) storyline. 6/10

Согласно игре, которая появилась десять лет назад, успешные головоломки могут вас отбросить, поэтому вы можете пойти в игру, как детектив!

author: {'steamid': '76561197995704273', 'num_games_owned': 684, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 703, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 703, 'last_played': 1529931782}
review: Непоганий стиль існуючох дилогії AGON. Цікава фішка з історичними та науковими книгами. Toledo виявився трохи складнішим за Mysterious Codex, але це все відносно. Нажаль, розробники так поки що і не зробили завершальну частину про Китай. Це було б дуже цікаво. Добрий квест, але не для тих, хто поспішає.

author: {'steamid': '76561198426344857', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 300, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 291, 'last_played': 1508814972}

author: {'steamid': '76561197968806363', 'num_games_owned': 2330, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 459, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 459, 'last_played': 1502191335}
review:
Game won in a giveaway on Steam Gifts.

AGON - The Lost Sword of Toledo is a captivating well-told point and click puzzle game. The story is top-notch and has a nice proper arc. People compare this game to a movie and I think story-wise that fits, though there is a ton of gameplay! I wouldn't call it a movie simply because there is so much gameplay. The voice acting fits the game well. The puzzles have a lot of neat parts to them, though some are too complicated for my liking.

Few main problems with the game: can't skip dialogue, the game doesn't help you with the puzzles and investigation enough, and the transitions between movement and areas can't be disabled making backtracking really slow.

Pros
Story
Voice acting
Music
Neat puzzles with lots of intricate parts
Inanimate models are really well done

Cons
Some of the puzzles are too complicated
No hand-holding, barely even any nudges in the right direction - throw me a bone would ya?
Lots of backtracking, with transitions really slowing you down
Can't skip dialogue properly. Really slows you down when talking to the police officer who speaks slowly
Character models should be better for 2008

author: {'steamid': '76561197988271944', 'num_games_owned': 1346, 'num_reviews': 281, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1479829128}
review:
AGON è un puzzle game investigativo dove impersoneremo il professor Hunt; un uomo Inglese proveniente dal British Museum.

Ho trovato la storia molto scarna, poco credibile e per niente interessante. Il periodo storico è il 1904, il luogo dove si svolgeranno i fatti è la città di Toledo.

Il nostro VERO obbiettivo sarà quello di trovare e impossessarci delle opere d'arte presenti nella città, per portarle nella nostra amata madrepatria.
 
La grafica lascia a desiderare, molto; ma è pur un prodotto che ha un pò di anni; tuttavia, il vero tasto dolente, come detto in precedenza; è la storia.

Giochi del genere dovrebbero attirare da quella, poiché non hanno molto altro da offrire e qui, l'unico vero fattore IMPORTANTE viene a mancare; bocciato.

Voto Finale: 4/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198252011200', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 673, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 673, 'last_played': 1494921660}

author: {'steamid': '76561198063048114', 'num_games_owned': 2657, 'num_reviews': 540, 'playtime_forever': 147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 147, 'last_played': 1473334433}
review:
[b]The Good:[/b] Rarely-explored setting is a welcome change; good selection of challenging puzzles; nice sampling of cultural music; another great vocal performance by the main protagonist.

[b]The Bad:[/b] Scenic possibilities under-utilized; graphics looking dated; some unfortunate puzzle choices; little connection to series story arc; waaaaay too much reading.

6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197979068807', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 238, 'playtime_forever': 150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1473196368}
review:
Questo puzzle-game non mi ha preso nemmeno un po' e mi son rifiutato di finirlo. A prescindere dalla grafica imbarazzante (e pensare che le parti disegnate invece sono ottime e si poteva creare il gioco tutto in questo stile), la trama lascia mostruosamente a desiderare. Non si tratta di fantasy o di fantascienza ma di un racconto simil storico ambientato in Spagna nel 1904. Tutto dovrebbe ruotare intorno alla cittadina di Toledo, rappresentata nel videogioco come popolata da persone benestanti cadute in disgrazia per sventure varie. Il fulcro del gioco è invece il nostro personaggio, un anglosassone che lavora per il British Museum e che non vede l'ora di appropriarsi di una certa serie di opere d'arte da portare ai propri datori di lavoro. Per farlo "aiuta" i cittadini sventurati di Toledo (che nel 1904 conoscono tutti miracolosamente la lingua inglese e parlano come Super Mario). Insomma una storia decisamente poco credibile dove il buono, il nostro anglosassone, porta civiltà e buon senso nell'arretrata Spagna.
Samuel Hunt tornatene a casa tua, extracomunitario.

Voto: 3/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197997788394', 'num_games_owned': 9653, 'num_reviews': 329, 'playtime_forever': 377, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 377, 'last_played': 1466877842}
review: A pretty fun point-and-click adventure that get misjudeged. I would suggest it to any kind of POC fan. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198006563527', 'num_games_owned': 3471, 'num_reviews': 909, 'playtime_forever': 630, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1481689381}
review:
Der vierte Teil der AGON Adventure Reihe vom ungarischen Entwickler Private Moon Studios und dem französischen Publisher Microids. Ein sehr redseliges Point-Click-Adventure, das gewisse Ähnlichkeiten mit dem Subgenre der Wimmelbildadventures aufweist und auch an die Grafik-Adventures der 1990er Jahre wie Myst erinnert. Mir persönlich wird zu viel geredet und die Storyentwicklung verläuft mir zu steif und unlogisch. Dafür gibt es eine gelungene Synchronisation und ein ungewöhnliches Szenario um den Professor Hunt.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EzGA-eA5KSo

author: {'steamid': '76561198011965365', 'num_games_owned': 2442, 'num_reviews': 2092, 'playtime_forever': 300, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 300, 'last_played': 1467804763}
review:
This is a great game!! Tons of cutscenes to consist making this game a movie/game! The details in this game are amazing! Along with the animations of objects opening up. Voice acting and music feels well done for its time. If you are fan of point and click games get this game! 

Pros
360 degree panning
Subtitles available
Animation
Steam Trading Cards
In-game journal records most dialogue
Ambient sounds and background music add atmosphere
Voice acting
Different type of puzzles (multi-stepped, inventory, logic, etc)

Cons
Dialogue can’t be skipped once triggered

author: {'steamid': '76561198160757844', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1461098520}

author: {'steamid': '76561198249857902', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 266, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 266, 'last_played': 1455708979}
review:
7.0/10 - A Movie or a Game?

Overall I'm really excited about this Movie. I mean game. I am pleased to inform you the story indeed doesn't take place in Toledo, Ohio. Phew! 

My initial problem with the first was the controls, they were much less fluid than this game. Everything seems to be so much better with this game. Loving it. It reminds me of a Telltale game without the decisions and interactive elements. There are some Point and Click puzzles and travel requirements, but for the most part it's character conversation, cut-scenes. etc. (So not a game for all the time, but when I am wanting to sit back and enjoy... Perfect.)

The first conversation with a young girl took the first 19/22 minutes. She weaved an elaborate tale of her father. I am impressed and a little antzy. I was like wtf, I know everything there is to know now. I've also heard that there is play in the game where you watch thats over 20 minutes long. 

So prepare accordingly. I will update this as I play. 

Worth the $10 for this movie/game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198124770841', 'num_games_owned': 2744, 'num_reviews': 555, 'playtime_forever': 328, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 328, 'last_played': 1451486618}
review: 这应该是一个3D游戏吧。。。虽然是靠点击走动的或者换到下一个场景的。应该是做了人物和部分场景的3D建模，至少在一个场景里360度旋转视角也没见到什么显而易见的漏洞。

author: {'steamid': '76561198131498052', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 159, 'last_played': 1460983619}
review:
Jó játék, önmagában is van olyan hosszíú, mint az előző három.  A történet nem ül meg, van mindenféle fejtörő benne, némelyik egyből megoldható, másiknak nem szabad egyből nekirohanni és olyan is van, aminek több irányból is neki lehet menni, ha az ember zenész például. A kódexlap megszerzése itt is opcionális, de egy nagyonjó grafikus rejtvény során lehet eljutni hozzá.
A grafika szép, de mégis csak egy tíz éves játékról beszélünk, nagyobb felbontás esetén már észre lehet néha venni egyet-smást.
Csak ajánlani tudom, főleg, hogy most már magyar nyelven és szinkronnal is tölthető!
Akit esetleg zavar, hogy kevés (jelenleg kb 3 óra) játékidőm van benne, az csak azért lehetséges, mert eredeti dobozos verzióban párszor végigjátszottam, így mindent tudtam hol keressek.
